entity.name: Adam Matthiesen
entity.description: withstudiocms is a community-driven organization who's goal and overall mission is to build the best, free, open-source tools with the community for all to use, starting from our flagship project, StudioCMS, and then expanding and growing into multiple tools and utilities for the greater Astro ecosystem!

projects.name: StudioCMS
projects.description: Headless CMS for Astro, built with Astro, that provides a user-friendly and configurable dashboard for content management.

projects.name: StudioCMS UI Library
projects.description: The UI library for StudioCMS. Includes the layouts & components we use to build StudioCMS.

plans.name: Individual Backer
plans.description: Support us with a monthly donation and help us continue to ship new features and fixes for StudioCMS.

plans.name: Sponsor
plans.description: Become an StudioCMS Sponsor! As a thank you for this level of support, we will add your logo to the StudioCMS GitHub README and to our homepage

plans.name: Donation
plans.description: Make a custom one-time or recurring contribution.
